entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
